sentences.sentence: Hundreds of people today defied the ban on political gatherings.
sentences.translation: 今天有数百人违抗禁止政治集会的规定。

sentences.sentence: Ted hated parties, even gatherings of people he liked individually.
sentences.translation: 特德讨厌聚会，即便是聚会上的每一个人他都喜欢。

sentences.sentence: He spends his time making speeches at factories or gatherings of the Party faithful.
sentences.translation: 他花时间在工厂或者在该党忠实拥护者的集会上发表演讲。
